thread.title: Colorado man sentenced to life in toddler sex abuse
thread.title_full: Colorado man sentenced to life in toddler sex abuse | Albuquerque Journal News

author: Associated Press
title: Colorado man sentenced to life in toddler sex abuse
text:
FRESNO, Calif. — A federal judge in California has sentenced a Colorado man to life in prison following his conviction on charges of repeatedly kidnapping and sexually abusing a toddler during overnight stays at a couple’s home.
Prosecutors say 31-year-old Shawn McCormack of Colorado Springs, Colorado also distributed photographs and recordings of the abuse. U.S. District Judge Anthony Ishii sentenced him on Tuesday.
Prosecutors say McCormack pretended to be a Bakersfield couple’s friend, but used visits to their home to abuse their toddler in the middle of the night at motels while the couple slept. Homeland Security agents in 2010 discovered images and recordings distributed by McCormack.
A jury found him guilty in April of four counts of sexual exploitation of a child and two counts of kidnapping.
